About This Website

The reastaurant was founded in year 2022 by Sanya Moses Adeniyi

It may be hard to tell, but this website does much more than just help you choose a delicious dish from this cozy little restaurant. The website of this restaurant has served over 100,000 students all over the world (and counting), making them not to go hungry
